Now she desires to lift herself up again and soon search for another accessible commercial spot, and this time also with stand for other products like clothing items. Lucy requests a loan to give her business a boost in capital and supply it with everything that it needs to function normally. With your valued support, Lucy will be able continue providing for her two little ones; join this noble cause!

Translated from Spanish by Gabe, Kendra, and Jay of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteers

La perseverancia es practicada día a día en la vida de Lucy, quien siempre trabaja para ofrecer a sus dos hijos un futuro bueno y aunque le causó mucho sufrimiento la separación de su esposo por un caso de infidelidad. Ella con la frente adelante continúa luchando para sostener a sus dos pequeños hijos que ahora son toda la razón de su existencia y es por ello que está dispuesta a asumir cualquier sacrificio que les ofrezca bienestar.Se dedica a la venta de CD’S y DVD’s, de diversos cantantes y temas, antes lo hacia en un local comercial pero por el costo excesivo del alquiler, decidió hacerlo de manera ambulante junto a su hermana quien viaja periódicamente a la ciudad capital para poder comercializar estos artículos. Ahora ella desea levantarse nuevamente y luego buscar otro local comercial accesible y también de surtir su stand con otros productos, como prendas de vestir, Lucy solicita un préstamo a fin de inyectarlos a su negocio y de suministrarlo de todo lo que necesite para su normal funcionamiento. Con tu valioso aporte Lucy podrá seguir sosteniendo a sus dos pequeños, solidarízate con esta noble causa.

loans.use: Capital to acquire a greater quantity of items.

loans.name: Maruja Yesenia

texts.es:
Maruja is thankful for the care that her mother gave her for so many years. Despite the hard times that she has gone through, she was able to finish her studies in Pedagogy in a prestigious university. Now she is exercising her profession as a teacher. However, to be able to make ends meet, she has had to work very hard as a teacher and in the small business that she started. She opened her own business selling clothing mostly to her colleagues at work and other people that she knows. Thanks to this business, that she has been working at for six months, sometimes she travels to the capital to buy clothing at the bulk rate, and therefore she is able to earn more money. All of her hard work has the goal to be able to develop herself professionally, personally and to be able to pay for the costs of the medical treatment for her mother who suffers from heart problems. Presently she lives with her sister and her mother and she feels happy to be able to live in the company of the people who she loves most. Furthermore, the fact that she has started this new business has given her the opportunity to meet new people and make new friends. She would like to continue to sell these clothing items and for that reason she is asking for a loan to be able to purchase merchandise and then to be able to pay for the medical treatment necessary for her mother. Let’s support Maruja to be able to achieve her dreams.

Translated from Spanish by Edith and Johnny of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteers

Maruja, responde con gratitud el cuidado que le otorgó su madre por muchos años, a pesar de los momentos difíciles que le tocó afrontar logró terminar su carrera de pedagogía en una prestigiosa universidad y ahora es una profesora entregada a su profesión, sin embargo para poder sostenerse y debido al inmenso afán de progreso que posee, ha aperturado un negocio propio de venta de prendas de vestir y lo hace ofreciendo de manera ambulante, a sus colegas de trabajo y a personas conocidas, gracias a este negocio que ya lleva cerca de seis meses. Periódicamente viaja a la ciudad capital para comprar al por mayor prendas de vestir y obtener mayores ganancias. Todos sus esfuerzos tienen un único fin, el de poder desarrollarse profesional, personalmente y también el poder sostener los gastos que demanda el tratamiento médico de su mamá que sufre del corazón. En la actualidad ella vive con una hermana y su mamá y se siente satisfecha de vivir en compañía de las personas que más ama, además el hecho de realizar este negocio le ha permitido conocer a nuevas personas y poder entablar lazos de amistad. Desea seguir dedicándose a la venta de estas prendas de vestir y es por ello que solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería y el tratamiento médico de su madre.Apoyemos a Maruja a seguir adelante con sus nobles anhelos de progreso.

loans.use: Buy a greater quantity and variety of clothing items in order to contribute to her family's development.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia is very happy to have taken an important role in her family's economy. At the moment she is married with two children. She puts in as much effort as she can so that she can stabilize the economy of her household. She decided to open her own store five years ago because her husband, who is a taxi driver, had earnings that sometimes weren’t very sufficient to cover common needs. Her store is now one of the best around the city she resides in; her good service and friendliness earns the loyalty of her neighbors and friends. She is motivated to progress with the objective of satisfying the needs of her household. She needs a loan to increase the variety of products she sells. Your helping hand can make Alicia achieve a better economical situation for her home.

Translated from Spanish by Gabe and Kendra of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteers

Alicia, está muy contenta por haberse convertido en parte importante de la economía de su hogar. Actualmente casada y con dos hijos, que son su razón de vivir, se esfuerza para ofrecerles un hogar cálido y apacible.Para estabilizar la economía de su hogar decidió abrir su tienda hace cinco años porque su esposo que es taxista tenía ingresos que muchas veces eran insuficientes para cubrir satisfactoriamente los gastos de su hogar y en la actualidad, a pesar de que existen varias tiendas colindantes su pequeño centro de trabajo se ha convertido es una de las mejores, el buen trato y amabilidad que ella ofrece permite el ingreso diario de sus vecinos y amigos.Ella es motivada por el ingreso que percibe a diario y por las constantes visitas de sus clientes para seguir esforzándose con el objetivo de satisfacer plenamente las necesidades de su hogar. Solicita un préstamo para aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece. Sólo tu mano solidaria podrá hacer que Alicia logre mejorar aún más la economía de su hogar.

loans.use: Buy a greater quantity and variety of everyday items.

loans.name: Ignacia

texts.es:
The years of experience and the art with which Ignacia creates her beautiful works reflect the years of dedication and effort that she has given as a good lover and aficionado of this craft. As a child she learned the honorable job of weaving by hand and loom. She has always dedicated herself to this activity because of her satisfaction in it, and she’s still humble. She is sure that this is her true vocation. Ignacia began just weaving by hand and later she became known for the quality of her weaves, and her works began to be the most valued. With time she was able to save her income for capital and bought a machine loom for weaving, which is an indispensable and very useful instrument for her because she has been able to make pullovers and blankets that are special for carrying babies. Her productions are sold in the local market by her mother who has a sales spot in the city market. She desires in the future to be able to open a little sales shop of clothing items made of wool. Meanwhile she will continue producing and saving so that this longing of hers can be made a reality. It is for this reason that Ignacia requests a loan so that she will be able to buy wool and cotton fiber for the production of her weaves. Join Ignacia, a noble woman with high virtues.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

Los años de experiencia y el arte que plasma en los bellos trabajos que realiza Ignacio, refleja los años de dedicación y esfuerzo que como buena amante y admiradora de esta actividad le ha otorgado.Ella desde niña aprendió el digno oficio del tejido a mano y a telar, siempre se ha dedicado a esta actividad porque es de su agrado y aunque humilde, está segura de que es su verdadera vocación. Ignacia comenzó solamente tejiendo a mano y luego de hacerse conocida por la calidad de sus tejidos, empezaron sus trabajos a ser los más cotizados; con el tiempo capitalizó sus ingresos y pudo obtener una máquina de tejido a telar, ésta es para ella un instrumento de trabajo indispensable y muy útil porque con el ha podido elaborar pullos y mantas para cargar a los bebés. Su producción es comercializada en el mercado local a través de su madre que tiene un puesto de ventas en el mercado de su ciudad y desea a futuro poder abrir una tienda de venta de artículos y prendas de vestir hechas de lana; mientras tanto seguirá produciendo y ahorrando para que ese anhelo se haga realidad, es por ello que Ignacia solicita un préstamo con los que podrá comprar lanas y fibra de algodón para la producción de sus tejidos. Solidarízate con Ignacia, una noble mujer con altas virtudes.

loans.use: Buy a greater quantity of wool and cotton fiber for the production of her beautiful articles.

loans.name: Malena

texts.es:
Malena is a courageous woman who works daily to give the best of herself in everything she does. Since she was young and now that she is a responsible mother, she has always found ways in which she could increase her household’s income. She is a mother of three children. She gives them her love and also she teaches them the value of honest and hard work. Malena started a small business selling and renting CD’S, because the demand for CD’S seemed to be growing. Since the demand for CD’s is not always constant, Malena needed to start another business. She has decided to raise chickens and guinea pigs. She was able to do this with the training that she received around the raising of small animals. She has never doubted her dedication to raising animals for profit because it allows her to work at home and she is able to take care of her children at the same time. She can see the fruits of her labor because when she receives her earning she is able to help pay for all of her household expenses. She is motivated everyday by her children she will continue working. She’s asking for a loan to invest in buying sheets of corrugated metal to improve the conditions of her farm. Lets support this mother who has such a strong worth ethic.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

Malena, es una mujer de mucho coraje que día a día trabaja para dar lo mejor de sí en cada acción que realiza. Desde que era muy joven y ahora que es una madre de familia responsable ha visto diversas maneras de incrementar los ingresos económicos de su hogar, ella es madre tres hijos a los cuales viene dando todo su amor y también les enseña cada día el valor del trabajo honrado y esforzado.Malena circunstancialmente ha incursionado en el alquiler y venta de CD’s ya que esta labor tiene demanda eventualmente, así mismo y debido a que la demanda no es continua ha decidido instalar en casa un criadero de pollos y cuyes, con la capacitación que recibió en un comité de vaso de leche acerca de la crianza de animales menores. Ella no dudó en dedicarse a esto para también estar al cuidado de sus hijos y es así que hoy puede ver los frutos de su trabajo cuando obtiene las ganancias que le permiten ser un ente importante en el financiamiento de su hogar. Motivada cada día por sus hijos seguirá trabajando y solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de calaminas para mejorar las condiciones de su granja.Apoyemos a un gran valor de inmenso esfuerzo que sólo un corazón de madre puede albergar.

loans.use: Improve the conditions for raising guinea pigs in her home.

loans.name: Aidé

texts.es:
Serving others is very important and is a very noble perspective, which is found in Aidé, who having received studies as a nurse, she observed that it was necessary in her town to open a little pharmacy with the goal of attending her community’s needs. Today after a year has passed since her decision, she feels satisfied by what she has achieved, and the good service that she offers her clients motivates her to continue. Despite everything, she still sees an economic deficiency many times within her family that prevents them from getting out of debt and into a state of plentitude. So additionally she came to lend her services in a little hospital; many times it is very hard to take on this double job, but although her husband also works, the income still tends to be insufficient. In spite of the tiring and immense effort that she makes, she is motivated to put a smile on her little children’s faces, and they motivate her to keep working to ensure a more promising future. For this reason she plans to hire someone to help tend customers in her pharmacy while she keeps dedicating herself to both of her jobs. Aidé requests a loan to invest in the purchase of greater merchandise and also to improve her store’s infrastructure. Support a hardworking and persistent woman.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva volunteer

El servicio hacia los demás es muy importante y es una perspectiva muy noble en Aidé, quien habiendo tenido estudios de enfermería observó que era necesario en su localidad aperturar una pequeña farmacia con la finalidad de atender las necesidades de su localidad y hoy al cumplir un año de haber tomado esta decisión, se siente satisfecha por lo que ha logrado, la buena atención que otorga a sus clientes la animan a seguir progresando, pero a pesar de todo ve todavía las carencias económicas de su familia que muchas veces no le permiten desempeñarse a plenitud y de manera adicional viene dedicándose a prestar sus servicios en un pequeño hospital, muchas veces fue muy duro para ella asumir este doble rol y a pesar de que su esposo también trabaja los ingresos suelen ser insuficientes. A pesar del cansancio y del inmenso esfuerzo que realiza se motiva al obtener la sonrisa de sus dos pequeños hijos, quienes la animan a seguir trabajando para asegurarles un futuro prometedor. Por esta razón piensa contar con el apoyo de una persona que le ayude en la atención de su farmacia, mientras ella sigue esforzándose en su trabajo.Aidé solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de mayor mercadería y también para el mejoramiento de su infraestructura.Apoya a una mujer emprendedora y luchadora.

loans.use: Purchase a greater quantity of medicines and improve the infrastructure that houses her little pharmacy.

loans.name: Kelli

texts.es:
After many years of hard work Kelli has gained much respect in the sales business. She sells the best quality in natural products in her region. After working 8 years in this immense commercialization she has made great economical changes in a positive way. Kelli makes frequent trips to the city of Huancavelica in hopes of commercializing her products. She puts great effort into what she does because of her three children, whom she loves. Her oldest daughter plans on attending the nearby university. She also does it to progress her well being, as well as her families'. She is also in need of a loan to invest in buying more products this holiday season, so she can make a profit. Your help is greatly appreciated!

Translated from Spanish by Edith of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

Tantos años de trabajo le han servido a Kelli para hoy ser una de las mejores vendedoras de productos naturales de su región, las habilidades adquiridas la mantienen muy contenta y hoy después de ocho años de estar inmersa en este campo de comercialización, han mejorado notablemente sus ingresos económicos. Kelli realiza con frecuencia viajes a la ciudad de Huancavelica a fin de comercializar sus productos de manera ambulante, sin embargo su anhelo es el de poseer un local propio para convertirlo en una casa naturista que le permita al mismo tiempo obtener mayores ganancias. Todo este esfuerzo que realiza es por sus tres queridos hijos que están estudiando y la mayor tiene planes de estudiar en la universidad de su ciudad, también lo hace para seguir progresando y consolidar el bienestar de su familia; por estas razones Kelli solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de mercadería y aprovechar esta época navideña en donde ella tiene mayores ventas. Apoyemos a que Kelli siga esforzándose para progresar en compañía de su querida familia.

loans.use: Rent a site to make into the most visited naturalist store in the city.

loans.name: Linda

texts.es:
Linda is a young mother. She and her husband decided to make their living by selling natural products because it is a very profitable activity. They both work hard in this commercial labor to give their children what they need for life and development. Their economical status is pretty stable at the moment. She is satisfied with everything she has accomplished along with her husband. Though in many cases she feels endangered by the constant trips to city of Cerro de Pasco in order to sell their products, she continues forward because she desires to offer her children the best. Her oldest son is in school and the youngest one is barely a year in a half old. With a full life ahead and many projects in mind, she looks very optimisticly about the future. She hopes to establish a commercial spot to sell these products. She hopes that you can be an important part to her commercial development and she thanks you for your kind participation.

Translated from Spanish by Edith of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

Linda, es una joven madre y ante las carentes oportunidades de empleo que existe en su país para los jóvenes; ella y su esposo decidieron dedicarse a la venta de productos naturales por ser esta una actividad económica muy rentable. Están inmersos en esta labor comercial movidos por la necesidad de ofrecer a sus dos pequeños niños el sustento necesario para su exitoso desarrollo, ahora su situación es estable y Linda se siente muy satisfecha de haber logrado esto junto a su esposo y aunque en muchos casos es arriesgado por los constantes viajes que realiza a la ciudad de Cerro de Pasco para comercializar sus productos, sigue adelante porque desea otorgarle a sus hijos lo mejor.Su hijo mayor ya está en la escuela y el menor apenas tiene un año y medio de edad, con todo una vida por delante y con muchos proyectos en mente Linda observa con mucho optimismo su futuro y es por ello que desea establecerse en un local comercial para vender estos productos y para continuar con este proyecto, ella acude a tu solidario corazón con el objetivo de que puedas ser parte importante de su desarrollo comercial y desde ya agradece tu gentil participación.

loans.use: Rent a site for sale of her various natural products.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Miguel is a young and responsible father who watches over the well-being and health of his three year old child. For Miguel, having become a father is a high honor ; the experience brought him to the decision to strike out on his own and leave the family business in which he had worked since he was very young, and through which he was supporting his family. With the savings he had been setting aside and his natural ability as an orator, he launched his small business selling natural medicines - a business that is now the source of his family's well-being. Miguel offers his products daily and his power to persuade assures good sales results. He has seen significant growth in three years; this growth motivates him to continue working for the betterment of his family. Every fifteen days he travels to the capital to buy the merchandise he will market and sell. He is thinking about creating a natural products shop. To cement his plans for the shop he has been studying. With the shop in mind he is applying for a loan with which to buy a larger quantity of products for the Christmas season, since he has more demand and wants to take advantage of the opportunity to obtain better earnings. With his earnings he will continue supporting his young child, who will start school next year. Support Miguel in this project to launch a natural products shop in his city. Your support is very important.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

Miguel, es un joven padre de familia responsable que vela por el bienestar y salud de su pequeñito de tres años; para él haberse convertido en padre es un alto honor y a raíz de este hecho decidió independizarse del negocio familiar en el cual trabajaba desde muy niño y de donde él proviene para sostener a su nueva familia.Con los ahorros que atesoraba y la habilidad innata de orador, implementó su pequeño negocio de ventas de medicinas naturales y con el ahora puede otorgarles bienestar a su pequeña familia. Miguel ofrece sus productos diariamente y ese poder de convencimiento asegura sus ventas es por ello que ha observado su importante crecimiento en tres años y esto le anima a seguir progresando por el bien de su familia; cada quince días también viaja a la ciudad capital para obtener la mercadería y la su vez las comercializa. Él esta pensando crear una casa naturista y para concretar este propósito ha estado estudiando, con este objetivo solicita un crédito para comprar mayor cantidad de productos para esta época de navideña en el que tiene mayor demanda y desea aprovechar la oportunidad de obtener mayores ganancias, con el podrá seguir sosteniendo a su pequeño que el próximo año ingresará a estudiar.Apoya a Miguel en su proyecto de instaurar una casa naturista en su ciudad. Tu apoyo es muy importante.

loans.use: Purchase  a larger quantity and wider variety of products in order to quickly launch a natural products shop in his city.

loans.name: Dios Delante (Forward With God) – Groups #1, 2, And 3

texts.en:
Teresa, 6th from left in picture, is 53 years old. She has 10 children and 10 grandchildren. She is single and although all her children are out of her house, most of them still live in Sanchez and she helps support them and helps raise her grandchildren. She only has an elementary school education.

Teresa began her small business as a seamstress with her first loan from Esperanza. She takes orders from the people in the community and sews such items as bedding, curtains and clothes. Teresa is the “coordinator” for her group of five Esperanza associates in the larger Bank of Hope. Together with the coordinators from the other groups they form a “leadership council”, whose responsibilities incluD. involvement in community activities. In her opening prayer, Teresa gave thanks for the success of her business and for their continued growth, as well as for the health of her community

Members of these groups have been Esperanza loan associates for 7 months, and they have collectively paid back their first group loan. Ana G. is their loan officer; she makes the 40 minute trip out to Sanchez to be at their biweekly repayment meetings. The group meets in Teresa’s living room/balcony in the small fishing town of Sanchez on the Samana peninsula. Other businesses in her group incluD. clothes and shoes sales, and fishing supplies sales.

Julia C., R. E. and Joaquina E. were not present when this photo was taken

NOTE: This is a group loan. Teresa is one of 15 microentrepreneurs in her Bank of Hope solidarity group, all of whom have gone through Esperanza's business training courses. Each of the 15 members will receive a share of this loan for their respective businesses and will be accountable to each other for repaying their share of the loan together. This group-lending methodology ensures that members cooperate to help one another repay their loans and invest wisely in their businesses and families.

loans.use: To invest in their businesses

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
Walter already has 5 years experience selling natural products. He maD. the important decision to work independently after his contract in the business where he was working as a security guard ended. Seeing he had no better option, he decided to invest his small savings in the marketing of these products. He was motivated by one of his cousins and by the urgent need to support his family, particularly his two young children, who now are daily help and encouragement for his successful enterprise. He travels through diverse cities to market his products in the streets. Sometimes he sells door to door. He feels satisfied with the earnings he has been generating since his effort at work allows him to respond satisfactorially to every request maD. to him by a member of his family. Facing tremendous demand for his products, he is applying for a loan with which to acquire a larger quantity of products, with an aim to establish himself in the medium term in a retail storefront . Support this responsible father who dreams of giving the best to his children.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

Walter, ya lleva cinco años dedicándose a L. venta D. productos naturales y tomó esta importante decisión D. desempeño laboral debido a que culminó su contrato en L. empresa donD. trabajaba como personal D. vigilancia; es así que no quedando otra opción mejor decidió invertir sus pequeños ahorros para comercializar estos productos incentivado por uno D. sus primos, y por L. urgencia D. sostener a su familia y en especial a sus dos hijos que ahora son su ayuda y aliento diario para su exitoso desempeño. Se desplaza por diversas ciudades a fin D. comercializar sus productos D. manera ambulante y a veces realizando sus ventas D. puerta en puerta y por las ganancias que ha estado obteniendo se siente satisfecho ya que este esfuerzo le permite responder satisfactoriamente a cada una D. las solicitudes D. los miembros D. su familia. Ante L. gran demanda D. productos por L. que traviesa solicita un préstamo a fin D. adquirir mayor cantidad D. productos con el objetivo D. establecerse a mediano plazo en local comercial. Apoya a este padre D. familia responsable que desea dar lo mejor a sus hijos.

loans.use: Buy a larger quantity and a wider variety of natural products in order to establish himself in the medium term in a retail shop.

loans.name: Alicia Luz

texts.es:
Alicia is a courageous woman who works diligently to offer her children a bright future. As a responsible mother she works daily to cover the necessities and demands of her beloved family. Despite the economic crises she has seen, she remains motivated to continue her progress. Years ago she worked in various businesses but on the recommendation of a friend and through a loan she was granted 6 years ago, she began selling natural products. Through her extensive travels, she and her business have progressed well. She keeps herself well informed about the characteristicsof her products and the help they can deliver in order to offer them with eloquence and pertinence. Generally, she visits neighboring cities during fair days; the remaining days she sells door to door. She dreams of creating a natural products shop in the center of the city. To move ahead with those plans, she is applying for a loan she will invest in the purchase of more merchandise to market. Support a woman with a lot of courage and optimism.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

Alicia, es una mujer valiente que trabaja diligentemente para ofrecerles a sus hijos un futuro prominente. Como una madre responsable se desempeña diariamente para cubrir las necesidades y demandas de su querida familia y a pesar de las crisis económicas por las que han atravesado aún conserva las ganas de progresar. Años atrás se dedicaba a diversos negocios pero por recomendación de una amiga y por un préstamo que le otorgaron hace seis años, inicio su participación en la comercialización de productos naturales y en sus constantes viajes el progreso se ha manifestado. Ella se mantiene muy informada respecto a las características y ayuda que brindan sus productos para ofrecerlos con locuacidad y pertinencia generalmente realiza las visitas de las ciudades aledañas a su pueblito durante los días de feria de estos, durante los otros días realiza sus ventas de puerta en puerta. Desea crear una casa naturista en el centro de la ciudad y aunque ella admite que el mercado está saturado lo que marca la diferencia es su amabilidad, gentileza y conocimientos. Y para seguir con estos planes solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de más mercancía para su comercialización. Apoya a una mujer de mucha valentía y optimismo.

loans.use: Buy a larger quantity and a wider variety of natural products.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
Claudia works diligently to insure her family’s wellbeing and also to teach her six-year-old daughter by her example that each and every one of her dreams can be achieved through working hard. For that reason, she decided to open an Internet café in her home. Everyday she offers her services so that she will be able to support her family. Her and her husband work together in the business. The business has now outgrown the space in her home. Now she would like to open up another Internet café. Doing so will allow her to further increase her income and to continue to specializing in the type of business that she is so passionate about. Claudia is asking for a loan so that she will be able to invest in the maintenance of her computers and to buy new keyboards and mouses that she needs. With the earnings that she makes off of this equipment she will be able to continue her successful business and make sure that her family prospers. Support Claudia so that she will be able to reach her dreams of establishing another Internet café in the downtown area of her city.

Translated from Spanish by Johnny of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

Claudia, trabaja diligentemente para cultivar en su familia bienestar y también para enseñar con el ejemplo de vida a su pequeña de seis años que todos y cada uno de sus anhelos se pueden conseguir con trabajo y es por ello que decidió aperturar en su casa una cabina de Internet, en el que otorga sus servicios diariamente para llevar el sustento diario a su familia; ella turna sus actividades con su esposo que también trabaja en su compañía.La cogida de este pequeño espacio se ha ido incrementando y ahora desean aperturar una sucursal a fin de incrementar sus ingresos para seguir con la especialización respecto a este tema que los apasiona.Claudia solicita un préstamo para realizar el mantenimiento de sus computadoras y la compra de un teclado y mouse que le falta a una de ellas. Con las ganancias seguirá adelante para que la familia siga progresando, apoya a Claudia a seguir progresando y a alcanzar sus anhelos de establecer una sucursal en el centro de su ciudad.

loans.use: Maintenance of the computers and purchasing keyboards and mice for a few of them.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia is an admirable and diligent mother of two sons. Since she and her husband, Daniel, started their family together she has worked making handcrafted products. She started a business weaving attractive and colorful sweaters and jacket vests with her talented, agile hands. Later she sells them in large quantities on the city of Juliaca. Julia does this noble work from the early hours of the morning, while still caring for her humble home and her two babies. She and her enterprising husband work with a lot of effort to save enough to build their own house, as a way to offer their beloved children well-being, security and especially love and protection. Julia has a very large order this month, but is worried because she lacks sufficient capital to fulfilll it. She is turning to your generous heart and counting on your help and understanding.

Translated from Spanish by Kiva volunteer Erin Corcoran.

Doña Julia, es una admirable y diligente madre de dos niños, desde que formó su hogar junto a su esposo, Daniel, se dedicó a las labores artesanales y empezó a tejer hermosas y coloridas chompas y chalecos, que luego de confeccionarlas con sus ágiles y talentosas manos las comercializa en grandes cantidades en la ciudad de Juliaca.Julia realiza esta noble labor desde altas horas de la mañana, sin descuidar la atención de su humilde hogar y sobre todo el cuidado a sus dos bebés, ella y su emprendedor esposo trabajan arduamente para ahorrar lo suficiente y construir su casita, de esa manera ofrecerles, bienestar, seguridad y sobre todo amor y protección a sus queridos hijos.Para este mes tiene un inmenso pedido de confecciones y está muy preocupada debido a que no cuenta con suficiente capital de inversión para poner en marcha esta petición. Recurre a vuestro generoso corazón a fon de contar con su ayuda y comprensión.

loans.use: Buy raw materials with which to craft her beautiful clothing.

loans.name: Flora Francisca

texts.es:
We found Doña Flora ready to leave to sell her kitchen condiments: thanks to her sales skills, she goes offering her products from shop to shop through the streets of the town where she lives, Juliaca. This activity fills her with happiness and satisfaction, due to the daily good results that she obtains with her long walks.

Flora’s wish as a enterprising and hardworking mother is to improve the quantity of merchandise she can offer, until she manages to become the most important distributor of condiments in the town. She works incredibly hard, hoping to improve her quality of life. While she devotes herself to this noble aim, her husband works in a mine far from their village: between them they look to provide their five lovely children with well-being and education.

To realise her aims Flora is asking for a loan which she promises to repay within six months. Let us make this possible for her, in order that Flora and her family continue to prosper.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Encontramos a doña Flora, lista para salir a ofrecer sus condimentos de cocina, negocio que gracias a su habilidad de venta va ofreciendo tienda por tienda por las diferentes calles de la ciudad donde radica, Juliaca. Esta actividad la llena de mucha alegría y satisfacción por los buenos resultados que día a día va obteniendo con sus largas caminatas.

El deseo de doña Flora, madre emprendedora y muy laboriosa es aumentar la cantidad de su mercadería, hasta lograr ser la distribuidora de condimentos más importante de su ciudad, ella trabaja arduamente con el fin de mejorar su calidad de vida y mientras ella se dedica a esta noble labor su esposo se desempeña como obrero en una mina muy lejana de su pueblo, y entre ambos buscan ofrecerles bienestar y educación a sus cinco queridos hijos.

Para concretar sus deseos solicita un préstamo que promete reembolsarlos en un lapso de seis meses.Posibilitemos su petición para que siga prosperando junto a su familia.

loans.use: Purchase a larger quality and variety of condiments in order to consolidate her business and in a short time become the most important distributor in her town.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es:
22 year-old Amelia, when she started her family with Máximo, decided to leave her home town Capachica in search of a better future. Currently, she works as a walking salesperson, selling food in the Sunday market of the town she now lives in, Juliaca: a business which thanks to her excellent seasoning and above all her amiability with those she serves, she is now attracting regular customers. In addition to this work, Amelia dedicates herself to the rearing and sale of rabbits, an activity which also generates extra income for the sustenance and well-being of her dear family.

This hard-working mother’s wish is to one day own her own restaurant and she knows that in order to achieve this aim she needs to work hard; for the moment she wants to obtain a loan which she will invest in purchasing wholesale supplies, with the aim of reducing the preparation costs of each of her delicious stews which she offers every day from her small mobile tricycle, sometimes accompanied by her two lovely children. Let us contribute to the happiness of this young mother and her enterprising family.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Amelia de 22 años de edad, desde que formó su familia junto a Máximo, decidió salir de su pueblo natal Capachica en busca de un mejor porvenir. Actualmente se dedica a la venta de comida en forma ambulatoria en la feria dominical de la ciudad donde radica, Juliaca, negocio que gracias a su excelente sazón y sobre todo a la amabilidad con la que atiende va obteniendo asiduos comensales, adicionalmente a este trabajo doña Amelia se dedica a la crianza y venta de conejos, oficio que también le genera ingresos económicos extras para el sustento y bienestar de su querida familia.

El deseo de esta trabajadora madre es poseer algún día su propio restaurante y sabe que para lograrlo tiene que trabajar arduamente; por el momento desea obtener un préstamo de dinero que invertirá en comprar víveres al por mayor, con el fin de disminuir el costo en la preparación de cada uno de sus deliciosos potajes que ofrece diariamente en su pequeña movilidad (triciclo), en ocasiones acompañado de sus dos queridos hijos. Contribuyamos con la felicidad de esta joven madre y su emprendedora familia.

loans.use: Purchase of a larger quantity of the provisions needed to continue delighting the palates of Juliaca's inhabitants.

loans.name: Pelagia

texts.es:
Pelagia, the happy and enterprising mother of four children, occupies herself with selling livestock and making beautifully-woven jumpers and ponchos using alpaca wool. She started this noble work five years ago and thanks to the diligence and agility with which she applies herself to this beautiful art, her work is improving remarkably.

Pelagia’s desire is to improve the quantity and variety of her productions, until she is able to export her merchandise abroad. This is her motivation for obtaining a loan with which she will be able to acquire primary materials to continue working at these labours, and with all the benefits obtained to offer her dear children well-being and a good education. With your selfless help we will be able to help Pelagia to increase her output and offer secure well-being to her lovely children.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Pelagia, alegre y emprendedora madre de cuatro hijos, está dedicada a la comercialización de ganado y a realizar hermosos tejidos de chompas y ponchos basado en lana de alpaca, se incorporó a esta noble labor hace cinco años y gracias a la diligencia y agilidad con la que realiza este bello arte su trabajo fue mejorando notablemente.

El deseo de Pelagia es aumentar la cantidad y variedad de su producción, hasta lograr exportar su mercadería al exterior, para eso desea obtener un préstamo con el que podrá adquirir materia prima para seguir desempeñándose en esta noble labor, y con los beneficios que obtenga, ofrecerles bienestar y una buena educación a sus queridos niños.Con tu apoyo desinteresado podremos ayudar a Doña Pelagia a incrementar sus trabajos y ofrecerles bienestar a sus queridos hijos.

loans.use: Purchase greater quantity of primary materials.

loans.name: Basilia

texts.es:
We found Doña Basilia in her cosy and humble home, in the company of her charming and affectionate children. This enterprising mother and her faithful husband devote themselves to selling used electronic equipment, a business they took up two years ago and which is bringing them a lot of satisfaction and happiness due to the favourable results which they are obtaining, permitting them to prosper and offer the best to their dear children.

This enterprising mother’s wish is to increase her capital in order to invest it in her business selling second-hand equipment, merchandise they bring from Arica to sell in the town of Juliaca. This activity is very important for them and has become the family’s major source of income: so each and every effort is necessary thanks to the monthly bills they have to pay to cover the healthcare of their dear son Ramiro who suffers from a painful illness that makes it impossible for him to complete everyday tasks. Right now Basilia needs our help in order to move forward with her dear son.

Translated from the Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

Encontramos a doña Basilia, en su acogedor y humilde domicilio, en compañía de sus encantadores y amorosos hijos. Esta emprendedora madre y su fiel esposo se dedican a la comercialización de artefactos usados, negocio que emprendieron hace dos años y que les está trayendo mucha satisfacción y alegría por los resultados favorables que van obteniendo, permitiéndoles así prosperar y ofrecerles lo mejor a sus queridos hijos.

El deseo que tiene esta emprendedora madre es aumentar su capital para invertirlo en su negocio de venta de artefactos usados, mercadería que trae desde la ciudad de Arica para comercializarlos en la ciudad de Juliaca. Esta actividad es muy importante para ellos y se ha convertido en el principal ingreso económico de su hogar, todos y cada uno de los esfuerzos son muy necesarios debido a que mensualmente tienen que costear los gastos de salud de su querido hijo Ramiro que sufre de una penosa enfermedad que le imposibilita realizar labores cotidianas.En estos momentos Doña Basilia necesita de nuestro apoyo para salir adelante junto a su querido hijo.

loans.use: Investment of capital to acquire a larger number of electronic goods.

loans.name: Unisa

texts.en: Unisa is 39 years old and married with two children.  He sells fresh fish in the town of Magburaka in Sierra Leone.  With his savings and a previous loan, he rented a small cold room where fish can be kept fresh.   He sells the fish both retail and wholesale.  His plan is to be the sole distributor of fish to smaller retailers and therefore he is requesting a loan of US$ 1,200 to increase the amount of fish he can furnish.

loans.use: Increase the amount of fresh fish he has for sale

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en: Hassan is 40 years old and married with 4 children who are in school. He owns and runs a clothing stand in a small town of Magburaka in Sierra Leone.  He started the business 10 years ago but was interrupted by the civil war.  Hassan then picked up the business again in 2002 on a very small scale.  With his previous loans, he was able to increase his stock. He will complete his repayments for his most recent loan in December 2007.  He is therefore requesting a loan of US$ 700 to continue expanding the business.   Hassan’s business is the sole source of income for his family’s expenses.

loans.use: to add to the clothing he has for sale so that his profits will improve

loans.name: Sallamatu

texts.en:
Sallamatu K. is 47 years old and married with 5 children. Her husband is a small retailer in the town market of Magburaka in Sierra Leone, while Sallamatu sells palm oil and a few other items out of their home. This is because currently the business is too small to obtain a space in the market and they don't have enough capital for Sallamatu to get into wholesale. Her business stock increased after her second loan, however, for which she will complete payments in December.

Sallamatu is currently requesting a loan of US$ 275 to purchase 80 gallons of palm oil. This, she said, will permit her to expand her business, increase her profit, and reduce time and expense for travel to purchase the goods. Her future plan is to earn enough to enable her 4 children to complete their education at the college level.

loans.use: to buy larger quantities of palm oil at a time and lower her expenses by decreasing travel back and forth

loans.name: Adamsay

texts.en: Adamsay is 35 years old and married with 4 children.   She started her business by selling onions and chicken stock.  With her previous loan of about US$ 100, Adamsay diversified her business a bit.  Her future plan is to own a space in the market of Magburaka town in Sierra Leone where she can expand her business further.  She said she would like to receive a loan of $175 to increase her stock. She presently runs her business within her house and most of her customers are her neighbors.

loans.use: to purchase a market stall for her business in the long run; more inventory in the short run

loans.name: Isatu

texts.en: Isatu K. is 27 years old and runs her business in the outskirts of Magburaka town in Sierra Leone. She has a small kiosk selling general items in her home.  She does this to supplement her husband’s meager income.  Isatu’s husband works as a driver but his income is insufficient to meet family expenses.  She sells onions, cigarettes, and other items to earn income for her two children’s school requirements.  As she will complete her current loan repayments in December, Isatu is requesting another loan so as to increase her stock.

loans.use: to increase and diversify her stock so that she can expand her turnover this year

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en: Aminata is 28 years and married with 6 children.  Her husband owns a motor bike that provides transport services to the local community.   With his meager income, Aminata established a small business in the market of Magburak town to generate income to supplement her husband’s.  With her previous loans from SMT, she was able to diversify her business and earned a profit which she used to pay their children’s school fees.  She would like to expand her business further so as to earn more income and is therefore requesting a loan of US$ 275.

loans.use: to build her business by increasing the amount of goods she has available for sale

loans.name: Mabinty

texts.en:
Mabinty is 30 years old with 4 children and is married to a subsistence farmer who can hardly grow enough food for the family. She started a small business with her meager savings from the farm products. She later obtained a loan from SMT and spent part of the loan on farming and part was invested in the business to enable her to pay back the installments on a monthly basis.

Mabinty is proud that the family has increased their rice harvest because of the loan. She is requesting another loan to increase her business stock to generate more income to be invested in the farm in the coming season in April.

loans.use: to buy larger quantities of food items so that she can cook more and sell more

loans.name: Adamsay

texts.en: Adamsay T. is 25 years old and married with 2 children.  Her husband provides transport service to the community within Magburaka town of Sierra Leone.  Adamsay sells vegetables and palm oil to meet some of the family expenses.  SMT’s aim is to provide small loans to people like Adamsay for income generation so that they can improve their family’s economic status.  With her previous loan, Adamsay diversified her business to include palm oil.  She is requesting a second loan to continue diversifying her business.

loans.use: to continue diversifying her business

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en: Fatmata K. has been in business for 18 years but has experienced slow growth due to lack of sufficient capital.  She sells cotton and African prints in the market of Magburaka in Sierra Leone.  She joined the SMT loan program a year ago and has seen her business increase as a result of her first SMT loan.  She will complete her installments in December and would like to access more loans to expand the business further and also acquire a better location for the business.

loans.use: Expand her business by acquiring a better location for her storefront to attract new customers

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Fatmata is 35 years old and has 6 children. She sells vegetables and rice, millet, and palm oil from her home. Like many women in Sierra Leone, her husband is engaged in an on-and-off type of business and the income he brings in is not reliable.

Fatmata’s business is the main source of income for the family. With her previous loan, she increased her stock. With the income Fatmata was able to meet one of her children’s medical bills and is very grateful to SMT. She would like to expand her business further and is requesting a loan for that purpose.

loans.use: To gently grow her business by adding additional items for sale and increasing quantities of products that are in high demand

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Fatmata S. is 40 years old, and a widow with 7 children. The only breadwinner for her family, she sells palm oil along with some other items on the veranda of her house. Previous loans have enabled Fatmata to expand her business and earn more income. With the income, she is able to provide her children with an education and meet other family expenses.

Fatmata told us she would like to educate her first child to college level so that he will later assist her with the other children's education needs. She is determined to expand her business and is requesting a further loan to enable her to do so.

loans.use: To expand her business by including additional items for sale

loans.name: Roque

texts.es:
Mr. P. is 58 years of age and married to Mrs. Olivia Pérez de P.. They have 4 grown-up children. They live in a neighborhood near the center of the city of Luque. Mr. P. and his wife have been selling fast food—such as sandwiches, stuffed pastries, Paraguayan soup, croquettes, and beverages—out of their home for 5 years.

The loan will be used to purchase a microwave and a sandwich grill, which will help them prepare more meals like pizza and hot ham-and-cheese sandwiches, thus increasing their family income.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

El señor Roque tiene 58 años, esta casado con la señora Oliva Pérez de P.. Tienen 4 hijos todos mayores de edad. Viven en un barrio muy cercano al centro de la ciudad de Luque. El Señor P. y su esposa se dedican a la venta de comidas rápidas como sándwich de milanesa y de verduras, empanadas, sopa paraguaya, croquetas y bebidas varias desde hace más de 5 años en su domicilio.

El préstamo que solicita es para la compra de un microondas y una mixtera que le permitirá la elaboración de más comestibles como pizzas y sándwich caliente de jamón y queso a modo de aumentar sus ingresos familiares.

loans.use: Purchase of a microwave and sandwich grill

loans.name: Cesar Daniel

texts.es:
I have a used clothing business and I would like to invest in the purchase of more merchandise in order to boost sales. I make a living from and feed my family with this business, so I have to look for ways to increase my sales. I am requesting a loan of $800.00 to invest in my business.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

“Tengo un negocio de venta de ropa usada y en esta temporada de invierno me gustaría invertir en la compra de más mercancía para que mis ventas aumenten ya que este negocio es de donde yo alimento a mi familia, por lo tanto tengo que buscar la manera de vender más” Solicito $ 800.00 dlls para invertir en mi negocio”.

loans.use: Purchase of used clothing

loans.name: Karina Elizabeth

texts.es:
I have an unfinished construction project. My husband and I have worked diligently to build an extra room, but we lack the funds to finish the concrete roof. We urgently need to inhabit this room since our house is very small and our family has become quite uncomfortable. I am requesting $1,000.00 in order to build the concrete roof for this room.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Tengo una construcción sin terminar, mi esposa y yo hemos trabajado mucho para poder hacer este cuarto pero ahora nos falto dinero para construir el techo de concreto necesitamos mucho habitar ese cuarto ya que nuestra casa en muy pequeña y mi familia ya esta incomoda” Solicito $ 1,000.00 dlls para construir un techo de concreto en un cuarto de mi vivienda.

loans.use: Construction of the paving stone of a room

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
As you can see from the picture, the windows of my house are quite unsafe; you can easily remove them with a simple thump. I would like to install safety bars on all my windows so that I may give my family more security. I am requesting $250.00 to be able to carry out this project.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Como pueden ver en la foto las ventanas de mi casa son muy inseguras ya que con un simple golpe las puedes quitar, me gustaría poner rejas en todas las ventanas para poder darle a mi familia más seguridad” Solicito $ 250.00 dlls para poner rejas en las ventana de mi vivienda

loans.use: Installation of window safety bars for my home

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Tengo una casa de interés social muy pequeña, necesito construir un cuarto para que mis hijos estén más cómodos en realidad me gustaría poder ir haciéndola cada vez más grande pero eso me va a llevar algo de tiempo, quiero dejar a mis hijos una buena casa ya que es el patrimonio de ellos”. Solicito $ 500.00 dlls para la construcción de un cuarto atrás de mi vivienda

Translated from Spanish by Kiva Volunteer Wendy Wise

I have a small house that is part of a reduced-cost government-housing program. I need to build a room so my children may live more comfortably. Ideally, I would like to gradually make it bigger, but that will take quite some time. I want to leave my children a good home being that it is what they will inherit from me. I need $500 USD for the construction of a new room behind my home.

loans.use: Build an additional room to my house

loans.name: Nancy Helida

texts.en:
With a true entrepreneurial spirit and excellent business sense, Nancy is successfully combining her past professional experiences with innovative ideas in the form of a multiservice center. Located in downtown Ayacucho, Peru, Nancy’s small business is has a state-of-the-art photocopy machine, public telephones, cell phone services, and a small grocery store. She opened her independent business eight months ago and already the customers are coming in droves to take advantage of the many services Nancy’s business offers. 

Growing up, Nancy’s father owned a small public telephone business. She spent the majority of her life helping her father with the many daily chores that go into the maintenance of an independent business, learning the ropes. When Nancy got married and had two babies, it became very clear that although her husband worked very hard, his meager income was simply not sufficient to raise a healthy family. She decided it was time to become more economically independent and increase her contribution to the family.  She sold her home, took out a loan, and set to work establishing her new business. Using the experience she gained from years of observing her father as a foundation, Nancy built her business to not only incluD. public telephones, but cell phones, a copy machine, and a grocery store. 

Although Nancy is very pleased with the quick and obvious success of her business, she has bigger dreams she wishes to accomplish. Her space is very small and she is working toward the purchase of a much larger location to house even more services. The economic boosts she receives from her local bank, combined with her hard work and dedication, has given Nancy the ability to realize her greatest dreams.  She is currently requesting a loan of $400. With this money, she will buy more supplies for her grocery store and larger quantities of phone cards.

loans.use: to buy more supplies for her grocery store and larger quantities of phone cards

loans.name: Lucy Isabel

texts.en:
Lucy is an artist and her medium is yarn. When Lucy was just 8 years old, she picked up a pair of knitting needles and hasn’t put them down since. She specializes in all types of baby clothing and is always busy filling the many orders that are constantly rolling in from expectant mothers wanting adorable outfits for their new babies. Lucy specializes in baby clothing because she has a soft spot in her heart for children, being a mother of three herself. 

For the past 10 years, Lucy has been a part of her village bank, taking out loans and investing in her knitting business. It has grown significantly thanks to her hard work and the economic help she receives. She is currently saving her money in order to provide for all the costs that go into maintaining a happy and healthy household for her family. In addition to the economic help is has provided her, Lucy loves her village bank because it has taught her how to formally save her money in the bank instead of in the house, where it is easy to spend frivolously. Lucy is requesting a loan of $350. With this money, she will buy a wide variety of yarns in different colors.

loans.use: she will buy a wide variety of yarns in different colors

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand his business and to begin selling other fruits

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cloth, yarn, zippers and other materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy chairs, tables, and kitchen utensils.
